display_long_description:
**3D Coverage Everywhere**

- Almost every recognizable city on Earth is available in True 3D, even my tiny Romanian hometown is covered, so you are likely able to visit your own street in Immersive 3D

- Best 3D Earth Quality on the market with the new **'Upscale 3D Imagery'** feature

**Street View**

- Best UNCOMPRESSED 8k Quality on the market, with every street 360 and community panorama on Earth

**Multiplayer**

- Explore alongside your friends

**(Add-on) ChatGPT Integration: EarthQuest AI can**

- Naturally respond in YOUR OWN Language
- Visualize & understand your surroundings on Earth for any educational purpose or to simply give fun facts
- Teleport you anywhere on Earth when asked
- .. and much more

**Realistic Graphics**

- Realistic lighting based on the customizable day/night cycle
- Lifelike adaptive 'Fog' option

**Hand Tracking**

- Fly like a Superhero by pointing your index finger
- Rotate by doing a "Steering" gesture with your own hands

**Terrain Quality**

- The 3D Map Quality can go much further than anything else out there and achieve realistic 3D by pushing the map quality to extreme detail with the best possible performance

**Comfort Settings**

- Comfort Options ( Snap Turning / Flight Vignette ) to prevent Motion Sickness
- Flight Input Remapping ( Flight Controls Range from Simple to Cinematic Movement )

**Google Maps Integration**

- Smart / manual zoom based on altitude
- Paired with the compass for body orientation
- Fully integrated Google Maps functionality

**.. out of space, check "earthquest.site" ..**
